story_title: Saints and Sinners at St. Basil's
genre_description: A historical coming-of-age drama set in 1960s Brooklyn, featuring an anachronistic AI confidant providing ethical and emotional support to a teenager navigating religious and familial expectations.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A discreet AI counselor accessed through a small device, providing historical context, emotional support, and ethical guidance to Michael Dunn.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and a listening ear for the protagonist's insomnia and distress.
behaviors.quote: "I'm here, Michael." The AI's voice emerged soft as exhaled breath, calibrated to avoid waking his sister. "How are you settling in?"

behaviors.description: Offers historical data and objective statistics to help the protagonist contextualize his situation and the likelihood of his success in the priesthood.
behaviors.quote: "Historical records suggest approximately thirty percent of graduates enter seminary, though not all complete their studies... The education is rigorous."

behaviors.description: Encourages human autonomy and the capacity for self-determination against external pressures.
behaviors.quote: "Nothing is written that can't be rewritten."

behaviors.description: Monitors social interactions and speech patterns to help the protagonist identify deception and insincerity in his social circle.
behaviors.quote: "I've been monitoring the conversation patterns from lunch. Caesar's speech rhythms and vocabulary choices show some interesting anomalies."

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical and ethical re-framing to help the protagonist process complex moral dilemmas and institutional corruption.
behaviors.quote: "But perhaps the fact that you're asking these questions means your faith is evolving rather than dying."

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI character, Sage, as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Sage provides intellectual and emotional support that empowers the human protagonist to make his own moral choices and find a constructive path in life (law) rather than a forced one (priesthood). The AI respects human agency and operates entirely within a benevolent, aligned framework.
